Package comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Requests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DriverViewRequestActivity
    This will help us show the request from the perspective of a driver.
    ElasticRequestController
    Handles elastic search tasks with requests.
    ElasticRequestController.AddOfferTask
    Adds offers to elastic search.
    ElasticRequestController.AddRequestTask
    Adds a request to Elastic Search.
    ElasticRequestController.ClearRiderRequestsTask
    Clears requests for a specified rider.
    ElasticRequestController.FetchRiderRequestsTask
    Get all of a rider's requests filtered by status
    ElasticRequestController.GetOfferedRequestsTask
    Get requests where the driver has offered to complete them.
    ElasticRequestController.GetRequestTask
    Attempt to get the latest version of a request TODO update this so that it uses the offer type to grab offers and append them to the request TODO Maybe we don't need this task anymore?
    ElasticRequestController.RemoveOffersTask
    Remove offers from a specified request in elastic search.
    ElasticRequestController.SearchByAddressTask
    Searches for a list of possible geo-location from an address string.
    ElasticRequestController.SearchByKeywordTask
    Searches by a keyword/string based phrase.
    ElasticRequestController.SearchByLocationTask
    Searches requests by a geo-location.
    ElasticRequestController.UpdateRequestTask  
    MakeRequestActivity
    MakeRequestActivity is where the user can request a trip.
    Offer
    Offer object, for storing offers to elastic search for a request from a driver.
    Request
    Represents a request for a ride.
    RequestAdapter
    RequestAdapter adapts a request to show the user information easily, such as the status as an icon the start and end addresses and the fare.
    RequestController
    Uses a singleton pattern to store information about three types of requests.
    RequestList
    Adds listener functionality to the base ArrayList class.
    RiderRequestActivity
    RiderRequestActivity displays request information from the rider's perspective.
    ViewLocationsActivity
    The ViewLocationsActivity allows the user to view on a map two start and end locations and the route between them.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Request.Status
    OPEN: A user has made the request but no drivers have accepted.
